title: So what did you get from the mystery gift?
body:
I got Divine {{champion:16}} 
What did you get?

replies.body: Infernal {{champion:82}}, which is awesome since he's one of my favorite champs.
may the METAL be on your side

Kennen M.D Q_Q 

I've been such a good girl last year, and they gave me this skin ;~; LOL

ITS LIKE THE WORST KENNEN SKIN ZZZZZ QQ
but he looks so good and its 1 of the most mentioned skins
I got union jack {{champion:9}}  dont play fid but never seen the skin in game before

> [{quoted}](name=saDD3ath,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=BQg79cas,comment-id=001e0000,timestamp=2015-01-16T18:36:52.996+0000)
>
> it's legacy

obviously but most people still only play like birthday party fid anyway

its bc they wanna support skins that are made bc of the forums and show to riot that community skins are alot better (which they are).the moment i get enough RP imma gonna get a skin that was made bc of the forums 2
I got Jade Dragon Jewko--I mean {{champion:62}}

> [{quoted}](name=sftyfrstbssrckr,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=BQg79cas,comment-id=001c,timestamp=2015-01-16T00:22:59.557+0000)
>
> full metal {{champion:80}}

full metal baker on the house
Wow I love that skin! you are so lucky!

Rageborn {{champion:36}} 
It would be more awesome if i didnt already own BDSM {{champion:36}}  (executioner)
And if i played mundo xD

but its an awesome skin on its own anyway.

> [{quoted}](name=Paean,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=BQg79cas,comment-id=0014,timestamp=2015-01-14T22:59:11.442+0000)
>
> Rageborn {{champion:36}} 
> It would be more awesome if i didnt already own BDSM {{champion:36}}  (executioner)
> And if i played mundo xD
> 
> but its an awesome skin on its own anyway.

those cleavers so good,specially if they hit
and keep punishing bad boys ;)
Got Abyssal {{champion:111}} today. I should definitely play one of my favorite champion more often.

Finally got my skin. 

Prom Queen Annie.

I even told myself yesterday: Inb4 I get an Annie skin (I already own reverse and the one that parodies Alice in Wonderland). FML.

Nemesis Jax!{{champion:24}}   Really got lucky with that because I actually do play him from time to time...plus I don't care for his other ones really :/ But still really cool to hear what everyone else got.  They're passing out some really good skins
Asstronot {{champion:17}} ... I know what I spelled ._.
do warnings about leaving to many games mean i dont get a skin or do i just have to possibly wait a little longer to get it

> [{quoted}](name=Grimspeake,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=BQg79cas,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-09T06:49:35.302+0000)
>
> do warnings about leaving to many games mean i dont get a skin or do i just have to possibly wait a little longer to get it

If you have recieved a chat ristriction, ranked ban, or 14 day ban (highest possible ban outside of permanent). Those are the things that will deny you the skin. And not everyone recieves it at the same time, I still have not gotten mine yet and I have not been banned once outside of a 1 day ban for having a really bad day.

dark crystal ryze

I find ryze boring T_T
